name: Super Mario Star Scramble: Re-Birth
description:
That's right, as the name of this game implies, this is a spiritual successor of a Trilogy of Mario fan-games simply known as "Star Scramble", in said trilogy, you must find Three stars in each level, so you can go to the next. While it is simple, it's fun to do as well.

What do you plan on Adding?

Well, here is some ideas i'm gonna try to figure out how to do it and how to get it to work properly.

  • Ranking System, depending on how well you do on a level, Like not getting damaged, collecting all coins, how fast you are on the level... That sort of stuff, your rank will be decided depending on those circumstances.
  • No OpenGL usage. Yeeeep, no OpenGL in this Construct project folks. I decided to not do this so people that don't have machines with OpenGL support can play this game.
  • Probably a bit more, but i need to decide on this.
Controls

Up Arrow - Jump

Left and Right Arrow - Move

C - Wallkick

Note: To use the Wallkick, you must be facing at the wall you want to wallkick off and press C.

The page and the game associated with it are still W.I.P, so come stop by when possible. You can play the Prototype level while you are here. You can Press R (when you aren't dead) to restart the level.
